reviewText:
IM VERY HAPPY WITH THE SERVICE, QUALITY , AND PROMPTNESS
THANK YOU
My mom enjoyed it so much thank you
is a classic I love this movie great price, fast delivery thanks
I really enjoy Cantinflas.  It's so funny but stills presents a social message, I have bought about 11 dvds,  I recommended to everybody
I bought this DVD for my father inlaw. He laughed his illegal ass off!! It had subtitles so I was able to follow along too

I first watched Cantinflas movies as a child.  I didn't quite understand the genius that was this comedian.  Now a half century later, I have had the opportunity to really appreciate his work.  More importantly, I learned by watching his movies that he took on all the social ills that faced Mexico at that time and sadly, even today.
Old time classic, and one of the gratest of all time in comedy Mario Moreno (Cantinflas )
I loved watching Cantinflas growing up. I ordered this one because is one of my favorites. Thank you for your prompt delivery. My family and I enjoyed watching this movie on Christmas day ;)

Hilarious like all of Cantinflas movies are. Great for the family as well . Too bad there aren't many movies made like this anymore. Picture quality looks great considering it is an old movie. Movie arrived promptly and packaged well.

I love this adorable movie. Very funny and endearing. I remember watching it as a kid and always wanted to own it someday. My whole family enjoys watching Cantiflas' movies, especially when he dances! The quality is great and it arrived promptly.
Wow this seller send me an amazing memory that was send fast and made me realize why I wanted to become a firemen since I was kid. Thank you once again.
